abilities.name: Sky Piercers
abilities.details: Kaelen has 5 usable Sky Piercers (the dual Sky Piercers that he wields can't be used for abilities), and some of his abilities require a specific amount of Sky Piercers in order to cast.[n]Upon hitting the enemy, the Sky Piercer will be placed behind the target. If Sky Piercer kills the target, it will continue to fly until it hits the next enemy, or stop at the end of the ability cast range.[n]Whenever Kaelen walks over a Sky Piercer on the ground, he picks it up and gains a burst of [ms]movement speed[/] for a short duration.[n]Picking up a Sky Piercer empowers his next basic attack within few seconds to become a Skypiercing Strike, lunging at his target, dealing additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ms]movement speed[/]).[n]If the Sky Piercer is not picked up after a certain duration, it will disappear from the ground and slowly return to Kaelen.

abilities.name: Cloud Breaker
abilities.details: Kaelen throws a Sky Piercer in the target direction, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ms]movement speed[/]).[n]This ability requires 1 Sky Piercer.

abilities.name: Impaling Rain
abilities.details: Kaelen leaps into the air and throws three Sky Piercers in an arc at a target location, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]slowing[/] all enemies hit.[n]This ability requires 3 Sky Piercers.

abilities.name: Air Walk
abilities.details: Kaelen performs a short, quick dash in a target direction (dash distance scaling with [ms]movement speed[/]).[n]This ability has two charges, allowing for quick repositioning so Cloud Breaker can hit a desired target, or reach dropped Sky Piercers.

abilities.name: Soaring Whirlwind
abilities.details: Kaelen focuses his momentum, gaining massive [ms]movement speed[/] that decays over the next few seconds.[n]During this time, Skypiercing Strike range is doubled and becomes a whirlwind slash instead, dealing additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to the enemy target and all enemies around Kaelen.[n]Scoring a takedown refreshes the [ms]movement speed[/] buff and extends the duration of Soaring Whirlwind.
